insert into s3_file (service_no, file_name, content_md5, folder_name, down_url, file_size, max_amount, down_amount, validity_time, upload_time, source_file_id) values (#{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceFileId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update s3_file set service_no = #{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_md5 = #{contentMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder_name = #{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, down_url = #{downUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, max_amount = #{maxAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, down_amount = #{downAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, validity_time = #{validityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, source_file_id = #{sourceFileId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, service_no, file_name, content_md5, folder_name, down_url, file_size, max_amount, down_amount, validity_time, upload_time, source_file_id from s3_file where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
